attractions.about: War Remnants Museum is a unit under the Department of Culture, Sports and Tourism Ho Chi Minh City. Located in the museum system of Vietnam, the museum for world peace and a member of the World Council of Museums (ICOM), the War Remnants Museum, the Museum of thematic research, collection , storage, preservation and display of the material, photographs, artifacts on the evidence of the crime and the consequences of the war that the invasion force has caused to Vietnam.Museum store more than 20,000 documents, exhibits and films, in which more than 1,500 documents, artifacts, films have been applied to introduce in eight thematic exhibition frequently. In 35 years, the Museum has welcomed over 15 million visitors at home and abroad. Currently with about 500,000 visitors each year, the War Remnants Museum is one of the only cultural tourism to attract high public credibility at home and abroad.
attractions.address: 28 Vo Van Tan Ward 6, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
attractions.name: War Remnants Museum

attractions.about: Bitexco Financial Tower at a height of 262 meters is the tallest building in Ho Chi Minh City up to date. With design concept is taken from the shape of a lotus bud, the Vietnam national flower, Bitexco Financial Tower is not merely a building which is covered in glass and steel, but also a symbol of beauty and the rapid development of Ho Chi Minh City economy, a key economic region in Vietnam. Bitexco Financial Tower is a typical example for creativity and unique design. One of the tower highlights is the first observation in the city at 49th floors. Saigon Skydeck has opened for all visitors from January 1, 2011. With a full range of services and facilities for visitors, the Skydeck has officially opened to welcome visitors both domestic and international visitors since July, 2011. Visitors have the opportunity to visit Saigon Skydeck, not only enjoy the full sight of the Ho Chi Minh City and Saigon River, but also have the chance to use the facilities and services at this Skydeck. With many activities will be held at the Skydeck during this year, with special offer prices for different customer groups, the Skydeck will be an attractive destination in the journey of Ho Chi Minh City's for both domestic and international tourists.
attractions.address: 36 Ho Tung Mau Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Bitexco Financial Tower

attractions.about: À Ố Show is one of Vietnamese Bamboo Circus performances. À Ố - derives from Làng Phố, which means ‘village and city’. À Ố Show tells a captivating story of the transition from the peaceful life of the countryside to the fast-paced metropolitan life of modern Southern Vietnam. The soul of village life and, in stark contrast, familiar scenes from the city, are beautifully brought to life -- with bamboo! The stunning simplicity of the bamboo props frames an awe-inspiring circus featuring acrobatics, contortion, juggling, and stunting. Throughout the show, both traditional and modern music harmonize richly, performed live with 17 musical instruments. À Ố Show has become a world-renowned circus, critically acclaimed in 11 countries.
attractions.address: 7 Cong Truong Lam Son District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
attractions.name: A O Show - Lune Production

attractions.about: Generations ago, Vietnamese puppeteers performed for their rural communities in waist-deep water, bringing to life legends and stories about their region. Water puppetry theaters like Golden Dragon Water Puppet Theater continue that tradition into the modern day and are a fun, family-friendly way to experience a hallmark of traditional Vietnamese culture.water puppet show, which is closely associated with the spiritual life of Vietnamese people, especially in the countryside. The show’s chosen stage is the surface of a water pool. The puppeteers present their clever skills in managing puppets by long bamboo rods and string mechanism under the surface. A traditional Vietnamese orchestra is an excellent music accompaniment. The puppets depict the story from the songs during the show, which reflects the peaceful life of the Vietnamese countryside, so it is not too difficult to understand it.
attractions.name: Golden Dragon Water Puppet Theater

attractions.about: Built in 1898 following the “flamboyant” style of the French 3rd Republic, Saigon Opera House was certified a National Relic & one of the top Ho Chi Minh City attractions. The Opera House hosts cultural entertaining performances, bamboo cirque, contemporary dance, orchestra concerts and government events. Come to the front gate to check availability and ticket to a performance in this iconic building.
attractions.address: 07 Lam Son Square Street District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Saigon Opera House (Ho Chi Minh Municipal Theater)

attractions.about: “From Norodom Palace to Independence Palace 1868-1966” explores the century-long history of the building that once served as the seat of the French colonial government in Cochinchina. In 1954, this building was renamed Independence Palace. It subsequently witnessed many dramatic episodes in the rise and decline of the government of Ngo Dinh Diem, the founding leader of the Republic of Vietnam

stays.about: Vinpearl Luxury Landmark 81 Ho Chi Minh City, with 223 rooms and suites, is spectacularly located in the high-end mixed-use Landmark 81, which at over 460m and 81 storeys high is Vietnam’s tallest skycrapper and one of the world’s top 14 tallest buildings, with luxury-brand interiors; set within the “green miniature city” of Vinhomes Central Park.

stays.address: 52 Pham Hong Thai Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: A dream-like gem in the very centre of Saigon. With 90 modern , trendy and stylish rooms, Alagon Plus Hotel & Spa leads the way in imaginative and creative interior design. Located in the centre of Ho Chi Minh City and close to Ben Thanh Market, Opera House, War Museum, Independance Palace... the hotel is at the heart of this buzzing city.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Park Hyatt Saigon
stays.address: 2 Lam Son Square District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: Park Hyatt Saigon enjoys a prime location on the city’s most famous square, overlooking Saigon Opera House, and within walking distance of the most popular cultural and historical attractions. The elegant, French colonial-style hotel houses 245 guestrooms and suites, redefining urban luxury with its sophisticated design, handcrafted details and modern-day comforts. World-class bars and restaurants include Opera, offering authentic Italian cuisine; Square One, serving both Vietnamese and Western dishes; Park Lounge, specialising in afternoon tea; and 2 Lam Son, one of the city’s top nightlife destinations. Residential-style meeting venues at Park Hyatt Saigon—the first of their kind, in the city—include the Pool House with a private barbecue area; and the Guest House featuring a show kitchen. For the ultimate in relaxation and rejuvenation, tranquil Xuan Spa offers wellness treatments inspired by traditional Vietnamese beauty rituals and ingredients, as well as a well-equipped fitness centre and elegant outdoor pool. The dedicated team at Park Hyatt Saigon provide warm, discreet and dignified service to those seeking relaxed, personalised luxury.

stays.address: 59 - 61 Pasteur Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Join us to experience the essence of Saigon city life at Liberty Central Saigon CityPoint as the perfect base to explore, meet and enjoy nightlife as well as business in Ho Chi Minh City. Only 8km from Tan Son Nhat International Airport, our hotel is located mere steps from Le Loi Boulevard, and within walking distance of the central business district, nightlife and the main points of interest.

stays.address: 2A - 4A Ton Duc Thang St, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: Fronting the scenic Saigon River and only 3-5 minute walk to famous Opera House, Dong Khoi Street and Le Thanh Ton Street for shopping, dining and entertainment, LOTTE HOTEL SAIGON, the most beloved 5-star hotel in Ho Chi Minh City, combines natural beauty and sheer opulence to provide the best for the discerning traveler. The breathtaking resort-setting and its distinctive architectural interior gives a feeling of luxury and tranquility. A legendary hotel inherits good and ancient Vietnam with garden falls, pond and fountain. The top pattern of the bronze drum, symbol of the sun, from ancient times, frames the entrance of guest rooms. The twelve horary signs in the atrium, the lobby surrounded by colonnades and the giant horse sculptures all of which induce you to meander in the space of the hotel.

stays.address: 08 Dong Khoi Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: One Of The Oldest Hotels In Ho Chi Minh City Since 1930 and completely restored in 1997, nestled in Saigon's scenic riverside area and within walking distance to major commercial and entertainment addresses, and still retains its French colonial style, provides a perfect base for conducting business or for having a completely relaxed vacation. At the Grand, every guest will enjoy a well-appointed room or a luxurious suite with plenty of room to live, to work or just to relax. Our warm inviting atmosphere, congenial staff and host of fine services help to make every stay the most enjoyable one. Our philosophy is to satisfy our guest in every possible way from the first time. You only have to bring yourself and time to relax and we will make sure that your holidays and business trip will be comfortable.

stays.address: 87-89-91 Ho Tung Mau Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Discover the stories of Saigon's captivating past at Silverland Charner, a stylish hideaway nestled in the city's historic heart. Inspired by the teahouses of the French colonial era, Silverland Charner is a charming blend of old and new Saigon, where every space brings the spirit of Indochine to life.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: The Myst Dong Khoi
stays.address: 6-8 Ho Huan Nghiep St., Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: The Myst Dong Khoi inhabits tree-lined Hồ Huấn Nghiệp Street, near the gently flowing waters of the Sông Sài Gòn, and steps from famous Đồng Khởi Street – the fashionable commercial heart of Saigon since colonial times. You’re free to meander along the riverfront, or head to the Opera House, to Notre-Dame Cathedral or to Independence Palace. Or heed the call of Nguyen Hue Walking Street with all its bars and boutiques. Venturing deeper into Saigon’s various districts, you uncover the city’s vibrant contrasts. Colonial architecture stands beside modern skyscrapers; tranquil avenues guide the way to the bustling Bến Thành Market. Experience the rich red hues of Chinatown and the verdant greens of towering dầu trees. Or just search the city’s sidewalks and tangled alleyways, navigating the calls of street vendors, the whiz of bikes and the welcoming scent of fresh coffee.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Duc Vuong Hotel
stays.address: 195 Bui Vien St, Pham Ngu Lao ward, Dist 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Duc Vuong Hotel Situated on Bui Vien Street, Dist 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam. Duc Vuong Hotel is one of the busiest tourists place where thousands of people from all over the world visit each year. Duc Vuong Hotel has easy access to many tourists attraction around the City. Duc Vuong Hotel was established in 2006 with 20 rooms, and thanks to our wonderful guests and excellent attentive staff, we have now proudly expanded our family friendly Hotel to 51 beautiful rooms. We also have added an additional location in District 10.Duc Vuong Hotel's goal is to ensure our guests always have a memorable and enjoyable travel experience. Our friendly and caring staff is here to serve you and we are more then happy to assist and arrange additional requests for special occasions such as birthdays, anniversaries, celebrations and also any other group meetings or parties. We are family! Duc Vuong's unique, charming and peaceful Garden Terrace restaurant & Lounge, offers a serene place to relax in comfort, after a long day of site seeing and enjoying your experience in our exciting and busy city. Duc Vuong's Garden Terrace restaurant & lounge is a quiet place for you to enjoy a relaxing and delicious, fresh and memorable meal, hors d'oeuvres and delectable unique drinks, all prepared with care by our phenomenal bartender and chef. This is also a brilliant place to view the sunrise, sunset and of course the very radiant moonlight! You will be amazed at the stunning view from high above the busy streets while experiencing the city lights and radiant moonlight The spacious, inviting visitors lounge always has fresh flowers, fruit and hot tea for you and your guests to enjoy.

stays.name: Hotel Continental Saigon
stays.address: 132-134 Dong Khoi Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to Hotel Continental Saigon, your Ho Chi Minh City “home away from home.” Hotel Continental Saigon aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Ho Chi Minh City, Continental Hotel is located a short distance from Nguyen Hue Street (0.2 mi) and The World of Heineken (0.4 mi).Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning, and Continental Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a concierge and room service. In addition, guests can enjoy a fitness center and free breakfast during their visit.While visiting Ho Chi Minh City, you may want to try some tapas at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Cuc Gach Quan, Bun Cha 145 Bui Vien, or Shri Restaurant & Lounge.Ho Chi Minh City is also known for some great government buildings, including Central Post Office, The Independence Palace, and Saigon Opera House (Ho Chi Minh Municipal Theater), which are not too far from Hotel Continental Saigon.Hotel Continental Saigon puts the best of Ho Chi Minh City at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

We have 89 inviting guestrooms, catering to business and leisure guests from all backgrounds. Our delightful Western, Asian and Vietnamese breakfast buffet is the perfect start to an exciting day in the city. Meanwhile, our front desk staff are happy to help with any questions or concerns guests may have. Whether it is guidance to cross the busy streets, directions to a famed relic or a restaurant recommendation, we are here to help.

stays.about: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Ho Chi Minh City, New Space Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its budget friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants, New Space Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Ho Chi Minh City.The rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.New Space Hotel features a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and room service. In addition, as a valued New Space Hotel guest, you can enjoy breakfast that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to parking.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Chua Vinh Nghiem (1.8 mi) and Tan Dinh Church (2.3 mi), guests of New Space Hotel can easily experience some of Ho Chi Minh City's most well known attractions.If you are looking for a good seafood restaurant, you may want to check out The Chopsticks Saigon Restaurant, Mam Vietnamese Restaurant, or Cau Ba Quan while staying at New Space Hotel.During your visit, be sure to check out popular art museums like Artinus 3D Art Museum, Fine Arts Museum, and The Factory Contemporary Arts Centre, which are all a short distance from the small hotel.New Space Hotel is sure to make your visit to Ho Chi Minh City one worth remembering.

Co.If you’re looking for something to do, The Independence Palace, People's Committee Building, and Cholon Mosque are a nice way to spend some time.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Erato Boutique Hotel as you experience everything Ho Chi Minh City has to offer.

Renowned for its beautiful interior designs, The Reverie Saigon also raises the bar for services and accommodations in Vietnam. Crafted to perfection, indulge in one of the 12 types of magnificently furnished accommodation as offered throughout 62 suites and 224 rooms. The highest hotel in Ho Chi Minh City, rooms and suites start from the 27th floor with beautiful panoramic views overlooking the central business district and the winding Saigon River through floor-to-ceiling windows. Interiors are curated by some of Italy’s most recognised furnishings design brands – including, amongst others, Colombostile, Giorgetti, Poltrona Frau Group and Visionnaire – with styles ranging from chic modern to classical European, from whimsically romantic to fanciful and sophisticated.

Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Ho Chi Minh City, Hon En Hotel & Spa is located a short distance from Chua Vinh Nghiem (1.8 mi) and Emperor Jade Pagoda (2.0 mi).Hon En Hotel & Spa is a budget friendly hotel offering a refrigerator, air conditioning, and a minibar in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. attractions.about: Art in Paradise Danang is the first 3D Trick Art Museum in Danang and the largest one in Viet Nam. Come to the museum, you will be suprised by hundreds of 3D art works. They were all drawn and painted by hand that used three-dimensional and scientific method combinations to make the paintings look realistic and live, and you can be part of them. It's not just an art, but a paradise. You will have a lot of happy memories with your family and friends here. Love!
attractions.name: 3D Museum Art in Paradise Danang

attractions.about:
The Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture is one of the first museums built in Vietnam by the French. The main building was constructed in 1915. It evokes some motifs of French colonial architecture in the early twentieth century and resembles the image of the Champa temples - towers in Central Viet Nam. 

Visitors will have the opportunity to contemplate more than 400 artifacts on display, including National Treasures and others representing the masterpieces of Champa sculpture in ten centuries (from 5th to 15th). The artifacts were made in a variety of materials, such as sandstone, terracotta, and metal. Grounded in various themes from fertility symbols, deities, mythical animals and architectural decoration from the Hindu and Buddhist, they express the features of cultural and religious values of the Champa people over many generations. 

The Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture is a must-see destination for visitors wishing to discover the culture and heritage of Central Viet Nam.

attractions.name: Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture

attractions.about: Da Nang Fine Arts Museum was founded on July 29, 2014 as a representative of the Central Region and Highlands to preserve, introduce and promote the values of the artistic heritage in the area. Located in the center of Da Nang City, at 78 Le Duan Street, Thach Thang Ward, Hai Chau District, Da Nang Fine Arts Museum is currently preserving and displaying a collection of about 1000 works of modern arts and traditional handicrafts in a three-floor exhibition with a total area of 1,185.5 m2. On the first floor, there is a reception, a theme exhibition area and an arts learning space for children. On the second floor, you can see a permanent exhibition that showcases modern art works which cover a wide range of materials, media such as oil, lacquer, silk, graphics and sculptures and so forth. On the third floor, it features a display of traditional folk arts and handicraft artifacts of Da Nang and the Central Region and Highlands as well.

stays.about: Sala Danang Beach Hotel is located by the famous My Khe beach, only 2km from the Han River and Danang city center. The hotel offers 162 rooms with views of the sea and the city center, SALA restaurant serving all day meals with international and local cuisines. You can enjoy drinks at the S Café and let us make your meeting more professional with our business center. We also offer many opportunities for fitness, rejuvenation & relaxation, with a fully equipped fitness center with classes at our ZEN Spa & Gym. In addition, ZEN Spa offers private and couples rooms with a diverse menu of treatments based on traditional Asian healing principles. Coming to the 25th floor, you can take a dip in the infinity pool with panoramic views of My Khe beach and Son Tra peninsula. There is also a rooftop bar serving drinks and snacks. Come and enjoy your stay with us, we will surely bring you the most wonderful holiday!

stays.name: Monarque Hotel
stays.address: 238 Vo Nguyen Giap, Phuoc My, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
stays.about: All travellers seem to be fall in love Da Nang city from the first time they arrive. Da Nang not only impresses visitors with dynamic image, always full of vitality, but also is attracted by the poetic natural beauty, enchanting with immense sky and sea and mountains. When traveling, we can't help mentioning the paradise of convalescence in this beautiful city and the MONARQUE HOTEL is one of them. With 75 elegantly designed rooms with unique neoclassical style with a slightly European orientation, new modern rooms will bring you an unforgettable experience here. The rooftop swimming pool is also a highlight of Monarque when you can just soak in the clear blue water while watching the panoramic view of My Khe beach - the beach voted by Forbes magazine as one of 10 charming beaches on the planet. In addition, the service from the room to the restaurant, spa, swimming pool will bring you great experiences in Da Nang. It only takes 2 minutes to walk from the hotel to My Khe beach, 6km to the airport, 2.2km to Han Market. In addition, the hotel also provides car rental services or tours to attractive destination such as Ba Na Hills, Hoi An, Ngu Hanh Son, My Son Holy Land, Cu Lao Cham ... with extremely affordable prices. More specifically, when staying at the Monarque, you will enjoy complimentary afternoon tea every day; delicious tea and pastries after a nap or after a tour will wake you up in strong energy to continue the journey to discover this livable city. Referring to Vietnam, we do not forget to mention Pho - a typical dish that many tourists eat and leave a lasting impression on their mind. Our hotel understands that demand and chooses Pho to make night food for customers staying here. Among hundreds of hotels in Da Nang, Monarque Hotel is proud to rank “the number one” on Tripadvisor's website, bringing in its upmarket beauty and profession with enthusiastic staff, we are confident to bring our beloved customers the best experience and unforgettable impression.

attractions.about: Vietnam Museum of Ethnology is a unit under Vietnam Academy of Scocial Sciences. Vietnam Museum of Ethnology is both a research centre and a public museum exhibiting the ethnic groups of Vietnam. The mission of the Museum is scientific research, collection, documentation, conservation, exhibition and preserving the cultural and historic patrimony of the nation's different ethnic groups. The museum also serves to guide research, conservation, and technology that are specific to the work of an ethnographic museum.
attractions.name: Vietnam Museum of Ethnology

attractions.about: Focused on the contribution of women to Vietnam's history and culture, this museum highlights their roles in Vietnam's many military conflicts as well as in commerce, including features on female street vendors, women's role in the family, and more recently, single mothers in Vietnam.
attractions.address: 36 Ly Thuong Kiet Hang Bai Ward, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam

attractions.about: A rare breed of turtle enjoys this popular lake almost as much as countless locals and tourists. Hoan Kiem Lake is a dynamic daily tableau, from morning walks amid locals doing exercises on the shore, to young couples water-gazing on park benches, to the multiple shopping and sight-seeing opportunities in the vicinity.  Centrally located in the city, Hoan Kiem Lake serves as a massive home base, and provides endless people-watching and recreational opportunities on the edge of the Old Quarter.
attractions.name: Lake of the Restored Sword (Hoan Kiem Lake)

attractions.about: The Long Bien bridge across the Red River connects Hanoi with the main port of Haiphong. Designed by Gustave Eiffel, the bridge sustained significant damage during the Vietnam War. Only half of the bridge retains its original shape, but a rebuilding project supported by the French government is currently in progress to restore the bridge to its original appearance.
attractions.name: Long Bien Bridge

attractions.about: Resembling the Opéra Palais Garnier, Hanoi Opera House, built in 10 years since 1911 by two French architects. The magnificent building became one of the top landmarks in Hanoi. The Opera House hosts cultural entertaining performances, bamboo cirque, contemporary dance, orchestra concerts and government events. Come to the front gate to check availability and ticket to a performance in this iconic building.
attractions.address: 01 Tràng Tiên - Phan Chu Trinh Old Quarter, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Hanoi Opera House

attractions.about: Chùa Trấn Quốc (or Tran Quoc Pagoda) is located beside the dazzling West Lake, on Thanh Nien Road, Hanoi. Particularly, it is seated on an island linked by a bridge to the causeway between the two most romantic lakes of Hanoi: West Lake and Truc Bach Lake.
attractions.address: Thanh Nien, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Chua Tran Quoc

attractions.about: Wellcome to Ho Chi Minh Museum! President Ho Chi Minh - Vietnamese hero of national liberation and great man of culture. After he passed away on September 2nd 1969, in compliance with the Vietnamese people’s aspiration, the Communist Party of Vietnam’s Politburo decided to build the Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum and the Ho Chi Minh Museum. After 20 years of preparing and building, the Ho Chi Minh Museum was inaugurated on September 2nd 1990, on the occasion of the 100th birthday of the President. Ho Chi Minh Museum has more than 170,000 decuments, objects and films about President Ho Chi Minh’s life and revolutionary work. They are invaluable assets of the Vietnamese people in educating patriotism, studying and following Ho Chi Minh’s thought and moral quallties; and encouraging the Vietnamese generations to succeed failthfully and excellently his great revolutionary work.
attractions.name: Ho Chi Minh Museum

attractions.about: This repository of Vietnam's military history includes rooms full of war propganda, photographs and documents from wars against China, France, and the United States. The grounds feature several captured aircraft as well as a central structure build from the wreckage of French and American planes. Visitors may climb the flag tower, with great views from the top.
attractions.name: Vietnam Military History Museum

attractions.about: Welcome to the Imperial Citadel of Thang Long – Hanoi! Situated at the heart of Hanoi, the Central Sector of the Imperial Citadel of Thang Long is an outstanding place of interest not only for the capital city but also for the country as a whole. The site is one of the ten special national heritage sites proclaimed by the Prime Minister in 2009 and was inscribed on the World Heritage List by UNESCO’s World Heritage Committee in 2010. Its Outstanding Universal Values are reflected in its historical longevity, its continuous role as a seat of power, and its multiple cultural layers. The World Heritage Site comprises two sections: the archaeological site at 18 Hoang Dieu Street and the central axis of the Nguyen Dynasty’s Citadel of Hanoi, which together create an integrated heritage complex. This was the most important sector of Thang Long Citadel, the capital of Dai Viet under the Ly, Tran, and Le dynasties from the 11th to the 18th centuries. It was also the core of the earlier Dai
attractions.name: Imperial Citadel of Thang Long

stays.name: Honeymoon Hotel
stays.address: 210 Lac Long Quan Tay Ho, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: About us !! HONEYMOON HOTEL - 210 LAC LONG QUAN - HN Honeymoon Hotel & Apartment is a luxurious, modern and fully equipped service hotel built since the end of 2017, going into operation in April 2018. Honeymoon Hotel & Apartment is located at 210 on Lac Long Quan Street, located in the resort, enjoyment area of ​​Hanoi. Coming to Honeymoon Hotel & Apartment you will enjoy the wonderful moments of life. With a convenient location, located on the aromatic path of the lotus aroma along the West Lake, a symbol of Hanoi Capital, it takes you only a few minutes to go to the sights like: West Lake, Truc Bach Lake , Ho Tay water park, Sen Tay Ho restaurant, Ciputra high-class urban area, Ho Tay yacht, Ho Tay lotus lagoon ... or visit the Ceramics road, have fun playing Duck, Moon Park ... with many other famous tourist places in Hanoi, or National Convention Center and banks, famous shopping centers such as Grand Plaza, BigC or BigC The Garden

stays.name: Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy
stays.address: 12 Nguyen Quang Bich Street, Hoan Kiem District Old Quarter, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Finding an ideal charming hotel in Hanoi does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy, a nice option for travelers like you.Rooms at Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy provide a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and a minibar, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.In addition, while staying at Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy guests have access to a concierge and room service. You can also enjoy free breakfast.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as St. Joseph's Cathedral (0.3 mi) and Imperial Citadel of Thang Long (0.4 mi), guests of Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy can easily experience some of Hanoi's most well known attractions.If you’re looking for a seafood restaurant, consider a visit to Cha Ca Thang Long, Avalon BBQ Garden, or Old Quarter Street Food Cafe & Cooking Class, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy.Hanoi is also known for some great gardens, including Ly Thai To Park and Botanical Gardens (Vuon Bach Thao), which are not too far from Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy.Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy puts the best of Hanoi at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Sofitel Legend Metropole Hanoi
stays.address: 15 Ngo Quyen Street, Trang Tien Ward, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: A prominent fixture in the heart of Hanoi since 1901, French colonial-style Sofitel Legend Metropole Hanoi – with its white façade, green shutters, wrought iron detail, and lush courtyard lawn – portrays an authentic sense of rich heritage, fascinating history and romance. The hotel boasts a long tradition as a popular rendezvous for discerning travelers, among them ambassadors, celebrities, and heads of state. Metropole Hanoi has been the recipient of numerous international awards for its excellent service. Celebrating the passion for great cuisine, the hotel houses a complement of distinctive bars and restaurants, including the bespoke cocktail bar, whisky lounge and restaurant angelina, Parisian café-inspired La Terrasse, haute cuisine Le Beaulieu, and traditional Vietnamese gastronomy Spices Garden.

stays.address: Cote 600m, Ba Vi National Park, Hanoi Vietnam
stays.about: The gem nestled in the ‘Lord of Mountains’ Welcome to the place where myth, history, nature and luxury harmonize! Nestled amidst Ba Vi Mountain range, along with the panoramic view of Northern Delta, Melia Ba Vi Mountain Retreat is the ideal getaway to relax and liven up your senses.

stays.address: 39 Tho Nhuom Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located in the middle of French Quarter, Ha Noi Old Quarter and governmental area, as well as the famous shopping and entertainment areas, this trendy hotel’s location is ideal for shopping, entertainment and business. With 60 modern and stylishly designed rooms, Acoustic Hotel & Spa has what every discerning traveler is looking for. From its floor to ceiling windows with panoramic views of the sprawling metropolis of Ha Noi to its comfortable ambiance and luxury neo-classical design. The Acoustic Hotel & Spa provides a multitude of drinking and dining options on-site, including Indigo Restaurant, Eclipse Sky Bar – one of the best rooftop bars to view sunset in Ha Noi, ideal for both relaxed yet stylish French dining and a chill out venue for friends to enjoy some fine wines & cocktails.

Taking inspiration of a Hanoian, the hotel is not only have an atmosphere of a traditional old Hanoi, showing clearly through it decor, but also present the spirit of Hanoians through the elegant way of providing service from each one of our staff.

stays.name: La Sinfonia del Rey Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 33-35 Hang Dau Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: La Sinfonia Del Rey is our first luxury boutique hotel and part of the La Sinfonia hotel and resort group in Vietnam. We’re an oasis of calm right in the center of the vivacious capital, committed to enhancing your experience with curated hotel features and an unbeatable location.

stays.name: Hyatt Regency West Hanoi
stays.address: 36 Le Duc Tho Street, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located in Nam Tu Liem district, Hanoi’s new business district, near major sporting and convention venues, Hyatt Regency West Hanoi offers a peaceful urban oasis with 519 modern rooms where business travelers and leisure guests can enjoy seamless and relaxing experiences. Hyatt Regency West Hanoi has undergone an extensive renovation throughout all guestrooms, public areas, event and meeting spaces, and culinary venues as well as a redesign of our tranquil landscaped garden, now featuring a waterfall. For guests looking to unwind after a busy day, the sky bar beckons with its relaxed atmosphere and spacious outdoor terrace, where guests can enjoy signature cocktails and panoramic city views. The hotel’s main restaurant, Market Café, offers a vibrant dining experience with its lively open kitchens and separate sections showcasing different types of local and international cuisine, from fresh seafood to Vietnamese fare. The expansive hotel lounge offers a relaxing spot for guests to connect and socialize, with an outdoor terrace overlooking Hanoi city and My Dinh National Stadium.

stays.name: Solaria Hotel
stays.address: 22 Pho Bao Khanh Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam

stays.name: The Hanoi Club Hotel & Residences
stays.address: 76 Yen Phu Street Tay Ho District, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Situated on the banks of Hanoi's largest lake, the West Lake, The Hanoi Club Hotel & Residences offers a first-class accommodation with uninterrupted panoramic views. The luxurious property provides professional service in a relaxing atmosphere with a long list of facilities which include fitness center, Bonus Club Jackpot and Gaming Center, Panda Kid's Club and Arena Golf Driving Range, making it a perfect rendezvous spot for either business or casual get-together. Aside from the hotel facilities, in-room amenities are also arranged to ensure you a comfortable stay. For those looking for an upscale establishment with a wealth of activities and kid-friendly, The Hanoi Club Hotel & Residences makes a perfect solution.

stays.name: Authentic Hanoi Hotel
stays.address: 13 Ly Thai To, Hoan Kiem Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Warmly greetings from Authentic Hanoi Hotel. Authentic Hanoi Hotel is conveniently located at the edge of Hanoi's Old Quarter. The hotel was named from the great King in history of Vietnam – Ly Thai To King, in the heart of the capital Hanoi thousand years of civilization and the ancient turtle tower, adjacent to the tourist attractions, Embassies, the vital organs of government, and commercial center The front of the hotel is opposite to Hoan Kiem Lake. The back of the hotel is opposite to Red River. You can visit Night Market at the weekend, visit this shopping area and Water puppet show...With 52 rooms, 02 meeting rooms and 02 restaurants, Authentic promises to offer the best services to the customers.Besides, Authentic Hanoi Hotel also offers the tours packages visiting Vietnam. So we can support us to have a wonderful trip to Vietnam.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Hanoi Graceful Hotel
stays.address: 21 Hang Phen Street, Hang Bo Ward, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi 1000 Vietnam
stays.about: If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Hanoi, look no further than Hanoi Graceful Hotel.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Hanoi, Hanoi Amazing Hotel Hotel is located a short distance from St. Joseph's Cathedral (0.4 mi) and Imperial Citadel of Thang Long (0.5 mi).You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as Hanoi Amazing Hotel Hotel offers guests free wifi.The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and 24 hour check-in. Plus, Hanoi Graceful Hotel offers free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Hanoi's popular shrimp restaurants such as Quan An Ngon, Madame Hien Restaurant, and Cau Go Vietnamese Cuisine Restaurant, all a short distance from Hanoi Amazing Hotel Hotel.Looking to explore? Then look no further than Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum (0.8 mi), Old Quarter (0.4 mi), and Hoa Lo Prison (0.6 mi), which are some popular Hanoi attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.The staff at Hanoi Graceful Hotel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

stays.name: Pan Pacific Hanoi
stays.address: 1 Thanh Nien Street Ba Dinh District, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Pan Pacific Hanoi offers 273 elegantly furnished rooms and suites, which boast breathtaking views of West Lake, Truc Bach Lake and the Red River. The hotel also has an impressive collection of 56 fully equipped serviced suites catering to the needs of extended-stay travellers. Savour a diverse range of international dishes from the all-day-dining restaurant or indulge in exquisite cuisine at our Chinese restaurant. Our lobby bar provides a relaxing ambience for guests to unwind after a long day. With 12 versatile meeting spaces, including a pillarless ballroom that can host up to 450 guests, the hotel provides the ideal venue for corporate meetings and grand banquets. Complete with an indoor pool with natural skylight, well-equipped fitness centre and rejuvenating spa, Pan Pacific Hanoi offers a refreshing new experience in the capital of Vietnam.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel
stays.address: 117 Tran Duy Hung Street, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: See why so many travelers make Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel their hotel of choice when visiting Hanoi. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel offer a minibar and air conditioning.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Guests of Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel are also welcome to enjoy a pool and free breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.Nearby landmarks such as Sky 72 Observatory (1.0 mi) and Keangnam Hanoi Landmark Tower (1.9 mi) make Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Hanoi.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Italian restaurants, including 3 Spoons, Kone Cafe, and Paula’s Wines, all of which are a short distance from Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular history museums such as Vietnam Museum of Ethnology, Ho Chi Minh Museum, and Vietnam National Museum of History.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel as you experience all of the things Hanoi has to offer.

stays.name: La Siesta Premium Hang Be
stays.address: 27 Hang Be Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to luxury boutique La Siesta Premium hotel located right in the centre of Hanoi Old Quarter. The hotel is surrounded by the most famous landscapes and historical spots of Ha Noi, just 2-minute walk to Hoan Kiem Lake (the Sword Lake). GREAT FACILITIES, GREAT SERVICE & GREAT LOCATION: Set in the heart of the ‘Eternal Soul of Hanoi’, the Old Quarter. Just 2-minute walk away from historical iconic landmarks, including the Hoan Kiem Lake, Ngoc Son Temple, Statue of King Ly, Opera. GREAT FACILITIES: Recently and very impressively renovated, we provide an excellent number of services; 60 hotel rooms, well-known La Spa, fine dining Cloud Nine restaurant, top-notch Lighthouse Sky Bar & free internet access throughout. Most rooms have large windows that can be opened to the fresh air and that also provide ample natural light. Dine with delight in our glass walled restaurant, enjoy the drink on the top floor Sky bar, and take in the panoramic view of all the Old Quarter has to offer!

stays.name: The Bloom Ha Noi
stays.address: 36 Pho Dich Vong Hau, Cau Giay Cau Giay, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: The Bloom Ha Noi locates in Cau Giay District, the blooming business center of Vietnam's capital city. Staying away from the crampedness of Old Quarter, our guests get to experience more relaxing stay with spacious, fully furnished, unique decorated apartments.

stays.name: AIRA Boutique Hanoi Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 38A Tran Phu Street, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Nestled in the lush tree-lined boulevard at No. 38A of the charming diplomatic Tran Phu Street, merely few steps from the quaint Hanoi Old Quarter and adjacent to many iconic monuments. The luxury 4+ star AIRA Boutique Hanoi Hotel & Spa is perfectly suited either your upscale business stay, a pampered vacation or a romantic getaway. With 60 luxurious, elegantly appointed rooms, Aira Boutique Hanoi offer a full array of high end services such as 360 degree panoramic view sky bar, award-winning restaurant, bakery & coffee shop, full spa parlor, boutique shop, a gym and all-season infinity pool. The famous Essence restaurant opens full day serving authentic Vietnamese and Japanese cuisine to satisfy your taste buds. Besides, shopping lovers can spend their time at Duccio and Heydi tailoring shops and later indulge in the favourite Essencia Spa, which is designed for rejuvenation and total relaxation. Step off the bustling streets of Hanoi and enter a serene retreat, prepare to be pampered at most.

stays.name: Hanoi La Siesta Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 94 Ma May St., Old Quarter Hoan Kiem Dist., Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: ABOUT US HANOI LA SIESTA HOTEL & SPAA peaceful hotel with a homely feel, The La Siesta hotel is the newest member of the Hanoi Elegance hotel Group.  Set apart from the rest of our other properties, it embodies pure luxury. Promising a warm welcome and personal service superbly located on old Ma May Street, it is in easy reach of Hanoi's evocative Hoan Kiem lake and major attractions. The latest gem is both modern in style as well as embodying the hidden charm of Hanoi's old quarter.  The hotel has 50 spacious bedrooms, including Suites and Duplex rooms. The Suites have modern and comfortable facilities with seating area. And the duplex rooms are particularly good for families and groups of friends.  Other facilities include a spa, gym, movie room to help you relax even more during your stay with us.For food lovers experience Vietnam's authentic cuisine at the Redbean Restaurant on the ground floor.  Additional thoughtful touches include our 24hour customer service, evening turn-down service, free unlimited wireless internet with PC in every room, cable TV and movies on demand, DVD player...Etc, which we hope will make your stay extra  special. Come and enjoy traditional Vietnamese hospitality in style and comfort and experience our Hanoi Elegance outstanding customer service at La Siesta Hotel.Hanoi La Siesta Hotel & Spa

Set among parks and lakes the hotel is a quiet retreat of serenity and comfort from the city’s vibrant streets. From the moment you are welcomed into the Hotel’s spacious Lobby, you will be surrounded by Vietnamese charm and traditional Japanese hospitality. The hotel features 256 generously sized and beautifully decorated guest rooms and suites with Hanoi City or Thong Nhat Park views.Whether your travel plans include meetings, conventions or leisure, the hotel can accommodate you in style and comfort - while offering a variety of amenities to make your stay a most rewarding one.

attractions.about: Located on the banks of the poetic Thu Bon River, in central Quang Nam province, 30 kilometers south of Da Nang, Hoi An ancient town is an Eastern oriental classic captivation. With the strategic location on the banks of the great river, with one seaside border (East), it used to be one of the major trading centers in Southeast Asia during the 16th century due to the early western trader occupying period.
attractions.name: Hoi An Ancient Town

attractions.about: Hoi An Night Market, occupying Nguyen Hoang Street in the centre of town, consists of over 50 local vendors selling a variety of local snacks, trinkets, clothing, jewellery, and accessories. Widely regarded as one of the most popular markets in Vietnam, it occupies a 300-metre-long street that overlooks Thu Bon River and is illuminated by hundreds of colourful lanterns, making a popular spot for photography as well.
attractions.name: Hoi An Night Market

attractions.about: Cham islands are 15km from Cua Dai. There are seven islands altogether named according to their shape or characteristics. They are called Lao ( pear ), Dai ( long ), La ( leaf), Kho ( dry ),Tai ( ear ),Mo ( tomb ) and Nom ( East Wind ). They have good climate, cool the year round, trees and animals as well as marine life are plentiful here. On the island, there are precious bird nests while under the water, the coral is marvelous. There are also scenic spots around the island, such as Suoi Tinh ( Love stream), Suoi Ong ( Sir’s stream ), Hon Chong ( Piled up rocks ),Hang Ba ( The lady’s cave ). the island is also surrounded by very nice beaches with clean white sand and transparent, cool water.
attractions.name: Cham Island (Cu Lao Cham)

attractions.about: Situated 56km SE of Nha Trang, this newly developed site includes a reconstruction of Dr Alexandre Yersin's outstation. The building contains items of original furniture transported from the Dr Yersin Museum in Nha Trang, and reproductions of several period photographs. Entrance fee to the historical site is 30,000 dong. On site parking is free.Also on site are: an open sided canteen, and five small chalets for rent at 500,000 dong per night per couple (100,000 dong per additional guest). Electricity is available, but as yet is inexplicably not connected. Hence (1) the canteen menu is limited to dried fish, dried squid and fresh chicken, killed just for you. Tea, coffee, soft drinks and non-refigerated beer are available without ice; (2) the chalets are unheated and without hot water; and (3) small kerosene hurrican lamps are used for lighting.To get here, go 17km from Nha Trang towards Saigon, turn right at Suoi Cat commune at a blue and white tourist sign "Ho Chua Nuoc Suoi Dau", after one km and turn left a market onto the Hon Ba road. Follow this road 38km to Hon Ba peak.A visit to this site would suit history buffs and those just wishing an escape from summer heat in Nha Trang. Good swimming holes are available in the stream at the bottom of the mountain, especially near the Foresty Inspection Station boom gate, 13km from the Suoi Cat turn off.

stays.name: Lotus Village - Nha Trang Center
stays.address: 20 Tran Phu Ly Tu Trong Entrance, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
stays.about: Lotus Village provides a range of fully equipped holiday accommodation including studio, 1 bed room or 2 bedroom suites in the central of Nha Trang Beach City. Our Condo satisfies all daily living necessities of life such as health, enjoyment, comfort and convenience. When people think of Nha Trang City, one thing that would normally appear in their minds would be the famous Nha Trang coastline. A beautiful shoreline covered with miles of white sandy beaches, along with dozens of unique islands that can captivate any travelers’ attentions. Lotus Village is blessed with an advantageous location where it is located directly across from the clear crisp waters of Nha Trang. From the room’s balcony, customers can observe and free their minds with a remarkable picture of the coastline. Along the road in front of the building is a coastal public park where locals along with foreigners exercise daily from early morning til night and this park is also a place where people usually gather together to immerse themselves in the beauty of sunrise and sunset. Tran Phu is truly one of the most beautiful streets in the city of Nha Trang. Nha Trang Center was built recently and has already earned a reputation for being one of the most well-known commercial and entertainment buildings in Nha Trang. Staying at Lotus Village means you do not need to go far to satisfy your needs. The building offers everything ranging from a shopping mall, a supermarket, various types of restaurants to a movie theater, children’s play areas, swimming pools and a dancing lounge. The most luxurious living quarters in Nha Trang Center are located on floor 6 to 16, which Lotus Village Company currently offers to our clients. Lotus Village guarantees our customers the best services, 5 stars furniture and appliances along with a 24/7 security team.

stays.about: If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Nha Trang, look no further than Queen Ann Nha Trang.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as St. Joseph's Parish Church (0.7 mi) and Bac Thanh Church (1.2 mi), guests of Queen Ann Nha Trang can easily experience some of Nha Trang's most well known attractions.As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a refrigerator, a minibar, and air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a concierge and room service while staying at Queen Ann Nha Trang. In addition, Queen Ann Nha Trang offers a pool and breakfast, which will help make your Nha Trang trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.If you’re looking for a seafood restaurant, consider a visit to Sailing Club Nha Trang, Louisiane Brewhouse, or Grill Garden, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Queen Ann Nha Trang.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Yang Bay Eco Park, which is a popular park amongst tourists.The staff at Queen Ann Nha Trang looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

stays.about: Nestled in the heart of Nha Trang Beach city, TTC Hotel Premium - Michelia is an ideal spot from which to discover Nha Trang. Only 35km away, this 4-star hotel can be easily accessed from the airport. With the city's main attractions such as Alexandre Yersin Museum, Nha Trang Beach, Khanh Hoa Museum within close reach, visitors to the hotel will just love its location.The facilities and services provided by TTC Hotel Premium - Michelia ensure a pleasant stay for guests. Top features of the hotel include coffee shop, laundry service/dry cleaning, 24hr room service, bar/pub, shops.The hotel features 199 beautifully appointed guest rooms, each including coffee/tea maker, non smoking rooms, satellite/cable TV, in room safe, refrigerator. The hotel's Fitness Center, Jacuzzi,and Beach Front are ideal places to relax and unwind after a busy day. Discover an engaging blend of professional service and a wide array of features at TTC Hotel Premium - Michelia.

stays.about: Mia Resort Nha Trang is a stunning 5 star resort nestled in a quiet bay on the beautiful coastline of Khan Hoa Province in Vietnam. Designed and built on eco-friendly principles, our boutique property comprises of just 73 rooms and villas set in lush, manicured gardens. All accommodations feature spacious, light-filled interiors, natural materials and sea views. There are three restaurants on site serving Vietnamese, Western and Italian dishes as well as fresh seafood, made from the freshest, locally sourced ingredients. The simply brilliant Xanh Spa offers some of the best Spa treatments in Vietnam, with a huge range of options for the whole family.

stays.address: 304, 2 thang 4 Street Vinh Phuoc ward, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
stays.about: Known as the Island in the heart of Nha Trang city, Champa Island and Cham Oasis have the most luxurious, unique and fascinating Cham’s architectures. In here, we provide a full range of services, such as accommodation, food & beverage, entertainment, conventions, MICE , private beach,ect. that will fully satisfy our guests. With the shape of two large ships heading out to the open sea, our resort has a 168 – room hotel, 2 condotels with total of 359 modern suites with 1 to 3 bedrooms, and isolated & detached luxury villas. Moreover, Champa Island also has fresh seafood restaurant, children’s playground, outdoor- sport ground, golf driving range, riverside café and event venues. We also have 11 private, luxurious massage and spa rooms, where your cares and stress will melt away, and experience with two biggest swimming pools in the center of Nha Trang, together with a pool bar and a fitness center located next to the Cham Oasis’s swimming pool.

stays.about: Nowhere else in Nha Trang Bay - one of the world's most beautiful bays - can you a find a setting quite like this: a quiet and pure tropical getaway with lush natural landscapes, life-giving water all around, and a stimulating cosmopolitan center nearby. With nothing separating you from nature but floor-to-ceiling glass walls, you can indulge in the peaceful surroundings or venture a few steps beyond and engage with the excitement around you. The hotel features 173 luxurious villas and 483 well-furnished rooms to meet your demands.

Roomfacilities : bathtub, airco & fan, elevator, telephone, wifi, minibar, hair dryer, make-up table, desk, cable net TV.

stays.name: Vinpearl Resort Nha Trang
stays.address: Hon Tre Island, Vinh Nguyen, Nha Trang 65000 Vietnam
stays.about: As an adornment to finish the stunning beauty and luxury of Nha Trang's charming landscape painting, Vinpearl Nha Trang Resort - an international 5 star hotel in the Vinpearl Nha Trang complex of hotel, resort, tourism and recreation- is called "a sparkling pearl glued on the crown of the sea queen" by the tourists. Located on a separate island in one of the world's 30 most beautiful bays, Vinpearl Nha Trang Resort features as a luxurious, idyllic, romantic and attractive resort . Not only being endowed by the nature with blue sea, white sand, bright sun and lush coconut trees but by the hands and sharp minds of talented people, who created an exquisite design, Vinpearl Nha Trang Resort has become the leading Hotel & Resort Complex in Vietnam. Vinpearl Nha Trang Resort enamors every visitor not only with the international "5 Star" hotel, longest sea-crossing cableway in the world, the best natural beach in Nha Trang or the most modern and largest outdoor swimming pool in South East Asia, but also premium wellness and beauty services and a wide selection of comfortable and luxurious restaurants. Come and let your soul leisurely float in a peaceful nature of Vinpearl Nha Trang, with all senses awakened for a full feel of perfection from every exceptional service and you will know why Nha Trang is indisputably given such luxurious and attractive names as "The tropical paradise", "Brilliant flower basket on the East Sea Coast" or "Vietnamese pearl".

stays.name: Amiana Resort Nha Trang
stays.address: Turtle Bay, Ph_m Van Dong, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
stays.about: Amiana Resort is a 5 star boutique resort nestled on a tranquil bay, offering barefoot luxury, guilty pleasures and understated elegance. Life at Amiana takes you on a journey of experiences, be it pampered spa treatments; culinary delights or private tours and excursions to off-the-beaten track islets or it might be your journey to inner peace. It is refined barefoot luxury on a stunning bay.

stays.about: Enjoy the ultimate enriching urban retreat in beautifully designed surroundings. InterContinental Nha Trang is the latest modern luxury beachfront hotel in town. Located in the heart of Nha Trang, a mere 40-minute scenic drive from Cam Ranh International Airport. Experience the perfect blend of local charm and elegant embellishment, the epitome of natural lavishness. Be inspired and entertained by our exciting array of tastes, venues and authentic dining experiences at our restaurants and bars. Rejuvenate your mind and body through a wide variety of modern and traditional treatments at Spa InterContinental. Be sure to take advantage of our exclusive ‘In the Know’ approach towards enriching your stay, where we will provide you with local insight and a fresh look at Nha Trang City. Finally, indulge in the blissful balance of business and pleasure with our range of meeting spaces or plan the wedding of your dreams. InterContinental Nha Trang is the perfect choice, whether travelling with your partner, family, or visiting on business.

stays.name: Evason Ana Mandara Nha Trang
stays.address: Beachside Tran Phu Boulevard Khanh Hoa, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
stays.about: Evason Ana Mandara is NhaTrang’s only beachfront resort. Its 74 accommodations in semi-detached garden villas, many with breath-taking views across the bay, offer classic Vietnamese touches. Dining choices include local, regional and international cuisine, with a selection of dishes that provide endless culinary experiences. The resort features an interesting blend of classic regional Vietnamese cooking with contemporary fusion. Most ingredients are sourced from local markets and rural Vietnam.The Six Senses Spa presents a Vietnamese experience of specialty treatments together with an extensive menu of traditional therapies that provide a truly relaxing and revitalizing experience to rejuvenate the senses. Skilled therapists create sensory journeys, with a medley of holistic wellness and pampering treatments. These include beauty services, manicure-pedicure and foot reflexology, using only natural products.Evason Ana Mandara is not only the perfect location for relaxation and tranquillity but the family-friendly resort also offers a diverse range of excursions and experiences to ensure that guests have an unforgettable stay. There is on-site tennis, the Kid’s Club, beach volleyball, and a water-activity centre, plus a PADI Dive Centre and a wide variation of dive excursions. In addition to being a perfect setting for weddings, there is a dedicated conferencing facility.

stays.name: Sunrise Nha Trang Beach Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 12 - 14 Tran Phu St., Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
stays.about: Sunrise Nha Trang Beach Hotel & Spa is the only beachfront Nha Trang Hotel built in colonial style. This 5 star hotel is idyllically located in the heart of Nha Trang’s tourist district just steps away from the beach within walking distance to major sightseeing, shopping and tourist destinations. The hotel features 125 sea-facing balcony rooms and suites with a gorgeous view of Nha Trang Bay and elegant touches. A Roman-style swimming pool and private beach are ideal places for sun lovers. Relax to the sound of the lapping of the waves on the beach and flickering lights of passing ships in the Sky Lounge, or simply unwind at the Lobby Lounge. Explore culinary diversity under a single roof at The Imperial and Huong Viet Restaurant. To pamper yourself, wander a short distance to Sunrise Spa offering luxurious treatments. Tours and recreational activities are specially tailored to explore, experience the local beauty, rich culture and attractions. Both leisure and business travelers will find necessary services, amenities and facilities served by professional staff exceeding your expectations.

stays.name: SeaSing Boutique Hotel
stays.address: 50B Cu Chi St., Nha Trang Vietnam
stays.about: SeaSing Boutique Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Nha Trang, offering a trendy environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Thap Tram Huong (2.1 mi) and King's palace (2.2 mi), guests of SeaSing Boutique Hotel can easily experience some of Nha Trang's most well known attractions.Rooms at SeaSing Boutique Hotel offer a minibar, air conditioning, and a refrigerator providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.A concierge, room service, and a rooftop terrace are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A rooftop pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to SeaSing Boutique Hotel, free parking is available.If you’re looking for an Italian restaurant, consider a visit to BOGOSOV Pizza&Grill, Feast, or La Velvet Restaurant, which are all conveniently located a short distance from SeaSing Boutique Hotel.If you are interested in exploring Nha Trang, check out a historic site, such as The Old House of Mr Hai Thai.Enjoy your stay in Nha Trang!

stays.about: See why so many travelers make Some Days of Silence Resort & Spa their resort of choice when visiting Nha Trang. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Ki-em Arthouse Hotel is a family-friendly resort offering a minibar, air conditioning, and a refrigerator in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free internet access is offered to guests.The resort features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Nha Trang. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.While staying at Ki Em Arthouse Hotel, you may want to check out Nhà hàng Quyết Thắng Dốc Lết (1.2 mi) which is a short walk away.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Some Days of Silence Resort & Spa as you experience all of the things Nha Trang has to offer.
